Header: Foreign Student Officers at Logistics School Tour Jaffna
Content: Foreign Student Officers who are at present following the Logistic Staff Course No 05 at the Army School of Logistics in Trincomalee called at the Security Force Headquarters - Jaffna on Friday (7), together with their family members. On their arrival, the Student Officers received a warm welcome from Brigadier General Staff of the Security Force Headquarters - Jaffna, on behalf of the Commander Security Forces - Jaffna, Major General Dharshana Hettiarrachchi. These Officers undertook this assignment as a part of their internal study tour and they were briefed on the 'Role and Responsibilities of the Security Force Headquarters - Jaffna and Military Assistance towards civilians in the post-conflict scenario'. In addition, the visitors enjoyed sight-seeing within the Jaffna Peninsula, prior to their departure back to Trincomalee.
